article_title: Reading Grandpa Murray’s remarkable diary to my quarantined mom fills the space with joy
article_description: Housebound as we all are  it s inspiring to relive the active days and nights of Murray Northrup  There is a sense of community and resilience in the pages that resonates in the time of COVID 19
article_content: I always thought Grandpa Murray was a boring man  Until my daily practice of reading his red leather bound diary to his daughter  my mom In truth  Murray was a giant of his time  meticulous  a hard worker who adored his family  a war veteran  and someone wh   9799 chars
